com.st.st25sdk

Class TagHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.TagHelper

  • public class TagHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines static methods to ease programming of NFC tags

      • getProductCode

        public static int getProductCode(byte[] uid,
                                 NFCTag.NfcTagTypes tagType)
                          throws STException
        Function used to retrieve the Product code of Tag contained in the uid byte array. The decoding depends of the tag type.
        Parameters:
        uid - Unique ID of the tag
        tagType - Type of tag (NFC_TAG_TYPE_4B, NFC_TAG_ISO14443SR, NFC_TAG_TYPE_V, ..)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        STException

      • getType4ProductId

        public static TagHelper.ProductID getType4ProductId(int manufacturerID,
                                                    int productCode)
        Get the Type4A Product ID from the manufacturer ID and the product code
        Parameters:
        manufacturerID - the ID of the tag manufacturer (ST=0x02)
        productCode - the product code
        Returns:
        the identified product ID

        Parameters:
